body: Also, can this be `prim::ListAppend`? It's not a tensor op, so it shouldn't be in `aten`. I know we make an exception for basic math ops to make the compiler simpler, but this is not the case here.
body_html: Also, can this be prim::ListAppend? It's not a tensor op, so it shouldn't be in aten. I know we make an exception for basic math ops to make the compiler simpler, but this is not the case here.
